title: Cant Change Password?
body: Whenever I try to change my password or email I never get a link from Riot to change it on my email. I've also checked spam junk and filters, nothing is coming through.

replies.body:
Hey man,

Double check the email address associated with your account is correct, if it is not you can change it [here](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/oce/en/).

Sometimes emails can be slow going, check back in 24 hours, if you still have not received an email regarding changing your password please contact [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new), they'll be able to assist you further.

Hope this helps.
